EmailTemplate.name: Parked.1 Parked
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners / {{lead.Full Name:default=}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=future associate}},
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. From our conversation you mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going?
Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before:
There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one:
http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index
MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, there’s real hard facts about The State of Independence in America (http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence) that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent.
Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
{{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=Steve}} ___________________________________ {{lead.Lead Owner First Name:default=Steve}} {{lead.Lead Owner Last Name:default=Arhancet}} {{lead.Lead Owner Job Title:default=Director, Consultant Services}} MBO Partners
t: {{lead.Lead Owner Phone Number:default=703.793.6011}} f: 703.793.6081 e: {{lead.Lead Owner Email Address:default=sarhancet@mbopartners.com}} w: www.mbopartners.com
